convert Arduino code to custom binary

B9 B8 B7 B6 B5 B4 B3 B2 B1 B0

Octave B[9:7]
1   000
2   001
3   010
4   011
5   100
6   101
7   110
8   111

Node B[6:3]
C   0001
C#  1001
D   0010
D#  1010
E   X011
F   0100
F#  1100
G   0101
G#  1101
A   0110
A#  1110
B   X111
Si  X000

Duration B[2:0]
1       111
1/2     110
1/4     101
1/8     100
1/16    011
1/32    010
1/64    001


// LOOP A
NOTE_DS6, NOTE_F6, NOTE_FS6, NOTE_GS6, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_DS7, NOTE_CS7, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_DS6, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_GS6, NOTE_FS6, NOTE_F6, NOTE_DS6, NOTE_F6, NOTE_FS6, NOTE_GS6, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_GS6, NOTE_FS6
8,        8,       8,        8,        4,        8,        8,        4,        4,        8,        8,        8,        8,       8,        8,       8,        8,        4,        8,        8
-> convert
1010010100
1010100100
1011100100
1011101100
1011110101
1101010100
1101001100
1011110101
1011010101
1011110100
1011101100
1011100100
1010100100
1011010100
1010100100
1011100100
1011101100
1011110101
1011101100
1011100100

// LOOP AS
NOTE_F6, NOTE_DS6, NOTE_F6, NOTE_FS6, NOTE_F6, NOTE_DS6, NOTE_D6, NOTE_FS6
8,       8,        8,       8,        8,       8,        8,       8
-> convert
1010100100
1011010100
1010100100
1011100100
1010100100
1011010100
1010010100
1011100100

// LOOP B
NOTE_F6, NOTE_FS6, NOTE_GS6, NOTE_AS6
4,       4,        4,        4
-> convert
1010100101
1011100101
1011101101
1011110101

// LOOP C
 NOTE_CS7, NOTE_DS7, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_GS6, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_GS6, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_CS7, NOTE_DS7, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_GS6, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_GS6, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_GS6, NOTE_FS6, NOTE_F6, NOTE_CS6, NOTE_DS6, NOTE_CS6, NOTE_DS6, NOTE_F6, NOTE_FS6,
 8,        8,        8,        8,        4,        8,        8,        8,        8,        8,        8,        4,        8,        8,        8,        8,        8,       8,        4,        8,        8,        8,       8,        

NOTE_GS6, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_DS6, NOTE_GS6, NOTE_AS6
8,        8,        4,        8,        8
-> convert
1101001100
1101010100
1011110100
1011101100
1011110101
1011101100
1011110100
1101001100
1101010100
1011110100
1011101100
1011110101
1011101100
1011110100
1011101100
1011100100
1010100100
1011001100
1011010101
1011001100
1011010100
1010100100
1011100100
1011101100
1011110100
1011010101
1011101100
1011110100

 // LOOP D
NOTE_CS7, NOTE_DS7, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_GS6, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_GS6, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_CS7, NOTE_DS7, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_GS6, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_DS7, NOTE_F7, NOTE_FS7, NOTE_F7, NOTE_DS7, NOTE_CS7, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_GS6, NOTE_AS6, NOTE_GS6, NOTE_FS6,
8,        8,        8,        8,        4,        8,        8,        8,        8,        8,        8,        4,        8,        8,       8,        8,       8,        8,        4,        8,        8,        8,        8,       

NOTE_F6, NOTE_CS6, NOTE_DS6
8,       8,        8
-> convert
1101001100
1101010100
1011110100
1011101100
1011110101
1011101100
1011110100
1101001100
1101010100
1011110100
1011101100
1011110101
1101010100
1100100100
1101100100
1100100100
1101010100
1101001100
1011110101
1011101100
1011110100
1011101100
1011100100
1010100100
1011001100
1011010100

// LOOP DS
0, NOTE_GS6, NOTE_AS6
8, 8,        8
-> convert
0000000100
1011101100
1011110100




-------- FINAL --------

"1010100100",
"1011100100",
